website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight moisturizer with ginseng and antioxidant coffee beans literally wakes up skin to give you a morning glow.
pros: The light hydration goes on with a cool sensation and absorbs quickly
It’s nongreasy so there’s no shine as the gel blends in
It also has a great fragrance
cons: Some users reported breakouts, while others preferred a cream with a heavier moisturizing content

customer_reviews.title: very Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: love this product and use it every morning. it’s expensive but i use and will keep on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying this due to the price. But there are 2 people using this DAILY for 4 months and you can barely tell any has been used. It's a great value and helps my eyes feel awake. It has made a huge difference in my mornings. I need all the help I can get chasing a toddler and this was just what I needed. Cant recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never buy another moisturizer again
customer_reviews.text: I have never paid so much for a moisturizer, but this is 100% worth the price. I got it in a sample pack from origins and fell in love with it. I have combination skin, with a very oily I-zone but some dryness around my chin, jaw, and nose, and this combats both perfectly. It smells great, and it’s lightweight. I’m not being facetious when I say I’ll never buy another moisturizer again!
customer_reviews.author: EAE

customer_reviews.title: Smells fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling moisturizer on the market. My skin runs dry and I'm allergic to about everything it seems. So far, I'm not breaking out from it, so a huge plus for me. I think time will tell if it actually shows a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vantresco

customer_reviews.title: Great product but wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Love Origins products but I received the wrong item! I ordered the gel moisturizer but instead received the cream moisturizer. Did not feel like doing the whole return process so I'm keeping it. Hopefully will be just as great as the one I usually get.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Vlakic

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Kind of pricey, but a little goes a long way. Just a drop on my finger will cover my whole face. Plus it feels great!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, I loved it. Great moisturizer, but very pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Yely

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This is the second time I bought it. It is not oily. Moreover, after I used it, I feel my face is very soft. I really love it, and I will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have extra sensitive skin and found this moisturizer to be both gentle and soothing! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie K Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Light and it smells great. Arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: This is not an eye cream as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as eye cream which was what I wanted and thought was ordering !! It is a moisturizing gel!!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Wayte

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and it wasn't hydrating enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Westrum

customer_reviews.title: Origins GinZing boosting moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is great! Feels good on your skin and makes it very dewy looking when you wake up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Poe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great!! I love the way my skin look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mervin C. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love origins products! Best moisturizer I have found for my oily face.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Daytime Moisturizer Texture
customer_reviews.text: The texture of this moisturizer is amazing. The smell is a little overly sweet-citrusy and takes some getting used to, but overall I really like how smoothly this goes on and absorbs, leaving my face silky and not greasy, a great base for makeup. Perfect amount of daytime moisture.
customer_reviews.author: SMCG

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer. Really didn't see any difference in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good moisturizer. Really didn't see any difference in my complexion though. Has a good invigorating scent.
customer_reviews.author: Benet Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: I like the citrus smell
customer_reviews.text: It didn't do much for me. It kinda stinged when I put it on my face, but it didn't last that long. I didn't feel much of a difference, but maybe that's my face problems. I like the citrus smell, I mean it's pretty strong. But I love the smell. It lasted me a long time because I didn't use it much. If I was rich, I would buy it to keep it in my bag. But it's pretty expensive, so I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Item
customer_reviews.text: If a lower star rating was possible I would give it. The product I received was not the product pictured. I returned it as soon as I could. On the bright side, there was no hassle with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. BUT it was not sealed at all.. The box wasn't sealed nor was the product itself.. So that really bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It was ok..
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't overly impressed with moisturizer...:( I will continue to use the rest of the product but won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Check out ingredients before you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I would have gone online and checked the ingredients before buying, I am allergic to caffeine and the active ingredient was coffee bean. I only tried it once and it was a bad day for me. Gave it to my sister, I am sure it is a good product but not for me. I wish it would have stated that it contained caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice face cream
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a night cream. It has a bit of a gel consistency. I love the slightly orangey scent. My skin is sensitive and tends to the dry side of combination. I like to layer products a little. Right now I'm using Damask rose gel as my first layer and apply the ginzing after it dries. I've been using this for years and have yet to find a night cream I like better.
customer_reviews.author: Hweddle9

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This goes on and gets absorbed pretty well. Also has a very nice cooling effect and a nice neutral yet fresh fragrant. But for my skin, it didn't work. It didn't hydrate and I stopped using it after a few months. My wife on the other hand likes it and still uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great for under your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product now for 2 months - i have noticed that my eyes feel a bit "brighter and more awake" in the mornings and have noticed the dark circles diminish a bit, but not as much as I like - hopefully more use will help! I put it on every morning and every night so it does go a bit fast.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyCox

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The smell is so fresh and lively. It doesn't feel greasy at all yet it moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: It works as good as it smells
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my daughter in law..this is the only face cream she can use due to her incredibly sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Chi town Girl

customer_reviews.title: Origins GinZing Energy Boosting Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a very good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Origins GinZing Energy moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I am in my middle years of life and have tried many moisturizers for my face, originally I had ordered this from Origins but found it cheaper on Amazon. It smells wonderful and works great for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Savaikis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scent and it's not too greasy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scent and it's not too greasy. It doesn't irritate my skin, but I'm not crazy about the jar. I wish they'd put it in a tube or a pump. This is good stuff, but I still like clinique moisturizer better.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: My go to face moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: Light & absorbs quickly. No stickiness. Brightens skin, like you just washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the item you get is what you ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it isn’t what I ordered or what was advertised!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Brogan

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this cream because I heard it really moisturizers ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cream because I heard it really moisturizers your skin, sadly that was no the case for me. I want to return this item..
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My wife always pesters me to wear lotion, but ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife always pesters me to wear lotion, but I actually look forward to putting this on in the morning! The orange smell is so addicting.
customer_reviews.author: melonbar

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Cream.
customer_reviews.text: My skin breaks out all the time and i have deep wrinkles but with this moisturizer i have seen major improvement on both issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Positively adore this moisturizer. It makes my face feel alive in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sabler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite skin line. Feels great on my face in the morning. Absorbs quickly before putting on makeup.
customer_reviews.author: katie webb

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Good moisturizer. Haven't noticed much of an awakening sensation with the morning application. Noticed a little help healing old marks from prior blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani hart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smell is so uplifting! I cannot wake up without putting this on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: I use the face wash as well as the lotion and they work great. A little on the expensive side but a ...
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of their GenZing collection. I use the face wash as well as the lotion and they work great. A little on the expensive side but a little goes a long way with this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: MN22

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not heavy very light. I will continue ordering this product wonderful product and recommend to anyone who is looking for a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Moore

customer_reviews.title: This product smells good but did not work on my face
customer_reviews.text: This product smells good but did not work on my face . May work different for others the consistency of this product was not very thick felt like I had to reapply it or it just dried too quickly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great for your skin
customer_reviews.text: really enjoy this product -I recommend it . it feels and smells great and enhances your skin overnight. try it!!
customer_reviews.author: L. spowart

product_meta.title: Origins Ginzing Refreshing Eye Cream To Brighten and Depuff for Unisex, 1.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: A lightweight, oil-free hydrating cream contains legendary skin-boosters including panax ginseng and coffee bean to boost hydration levels Instantly refreshes and revitalizes lackluster-looking skin.
feature_bullets: A lightweight, oil-free hydrating cream contains legendary skin-boosters including panax ginseng
Coffee bean to boost hydration levels instantly refreshes and revitalizes lackluster-looking skin
It is suitable for sensitive skin
Parabens, phthalates, sodium lauryl sulfate, propylene glycol, mineral oil, DEA, petrolatum, paraffin, polyethylene beads, formaldehyde & animal ingredients

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
